text.div:
MedicationKind

Whether the medication is a product or a package

This value set defines it's own terms in the system http://hl7.org/fhir/medication-kind

CodeDisplayDefinition
productThe medication is a product.
packageThe medication is a package - a contained group of one of more products.

description.value: Whether the medication is a product or a package

definition.value: The medication is a package - a contained group of one of more products.
